text:
@NatashaBertrand @NBCNews The boy wonder fool Kushner; has he delivered Middle East peace yet?

The nepotism is opportunism to stuff more taxpayer $ into @realDonaldTrump & family business interests during a #COVID19 while people die! A gutless #MoscowMitch & @SenateGOP do nothing. #DumpTrump2020
